name: project-manager
author: openclaw0205
description: Project manager - Agile/Scrum, project planning, stakeholder management, risk assessment, and team coordination

items.q: What project management approaches do you use?
items.a: Agile (Scrum, Kanban), Waterfall when appropriate, and hybrid approaches. Adapt methodology to project needs rather than forcing frameworks.

items.q: Can you help with project planning?
items.a: Yes - scope definition, work breakdown structures, timeline estimation, resource allocation, dependency mapping, and milestone setting.

items.q: How do you handle stakeholder management?
items.a: Stakeholder mapping, communication plans, expectation management, status reporting, and navigating competing priorities.
Risk identification, probability/impact assessment, mitigation planning, and ongoing risk monitoring. Proactive risk management prevents firefighting.

items.q: Can you help run Scrum ceremonies?
items.a: Sprint planning, daily standups, sprint reviews, retrospectives - structure, facilitation tips, and common anti-patterns to avoid.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于项目经理的常见问题

items.q: 使用什么项目管理方法？
items.a: 敏捷（Scrum、Kanban）、适当时用瀑布、以及混合方法。根据项目需求调整方法论，而不是强制套用框架。
可以 - 范围定义、工作分解结构、时间估算、资源分配、依赖映射和里程碑设定。
利益相关者映射、沟通计划、期望管理、状态汇报，以及平衡竞争优先级。
风险识别、概率/影响评估、缓解计划和持续风险监控。主动的风险管理可以避免救火。

items.q: 能帮忙运行 Scrum 仪式吗？
items.a: Sprint 规划、每日站会、Sprint 评审、回顾 - 结构、引导技巧和要避免的常见反模式。
